title: Lavaproof Tackle Bag
summaries: The Lavaproof Tackle Bag is an accessory that combines the functionalities of its components: the Angler Earring's 10% boost to fishing power, the Tackle Box's chance not to consume bait, the unbreakable quality of the High Test Fishing Line, and the ability to fish in lava from the Lavaproof Fishing Hook.

The Lavaproof Tackle Bag's increase in fishing power stacks with that of the Angler Earring and the <linked>Angler Tackle Bag</linked>, granting a total boost of 30% if all three are equipped. The decreased chance to consume bait does not stack with that of the Tackle Box or the Angler Tackle Bag.

statistics.Tooltip:
Fishing line will never break, decreases chance of bait consumption, increases fishing power by 10
Allows fishing in lava
statistics.Sell: 4 GC
